SVGRadialGradientElementCx.summary: The cx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the center of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("cx")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the x-coordinate of the radial gradient's center in the user coordinate system.
